title: Intro to HoloLens Development
speaker: shahed-chowdhuri
summary: Going beyond Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality, Microsoft brings you a new era of Mixed Reality with HoloLens! Learn how you can start developing for HoloLens today using Unity, Visual Studio and C#. Make use of Gaze, Gesture, Voice, Spatial Sound and Spatial Mapping for your holographic apps.
